name: MusicRadar Professional Drum Kits
description: High-quality drum samples from Computer Music magazine's MusicRadar collection, organized by category and style

acoustic.name: Acoustic Drums
acoustic.description: Natural drum sounds recorded in professional studios with varying microphone techniques

01-acoustic-close.name: Acoustic Close
01-acoustic-close.description: Close-miked acoustic drums with tight, punchy sound

02-acoustic-room.name: Acoustic Room
02-acoustic-room.description: Room-miked acoustic drums with natural ambience and space

03-acoustic-standard.name: Acoustic Standard
03-acoustic-standard.description: Balanced acoustic drum sound with moderate processing

04-acoustic-punchy.name: Acoustic Punchy
04-acoustic-punchy.description: Hard-hitting acoustic drums with aggressive transients

05-acoustic-vintage.name: Acoustic Vintage
05-acoustic-vintage.description: Classic acoustic drum sound with vintage character

06-acoustic-minimal.name: Acoustic Minimal
06-acoustic-minimal.description: Stripped-down acoustic drums with essential elements

electronic.name: Electronic Drums
electronic.description: Synthesized and programmed drum sounds for modern electronic music production

01-electro-classic.name: Electro Classic
01-electro-classic.description: Classic 80s-style electronic drums with analog character

02-electro-hiphop.name: Electro Hip-Hop
02-electro-hiphop.description: Hard-hitting electronic drums tailored for hip-hop production

03-electro-minimal.name: Electro Minimal
03-electro-minimal.description: Clean, simple electronic drums for minimal productions

04-electro-heavy.name: Electro Heavy
04-electro-heavy.description: Aggressive electronic drums with heavy processing

05-electro-modern.name: Electro Modern
05-electro-modern.description: Contemporary electronic drums with crisp digital sound

06-electro-punchy.name: Electro Punchy
06-electro-punchy.description: Sharp, punchy electronic drums with tight dynamics

07-electro-deep.name: Electro Deep
07-electro-deep.description: Deep, atmospheric electronic drums with low-end focus

vinyl.name: Vinyl Drums
vinyl.description: Vintage drum sounds with the warmth and character of vinyl records

01-vinyl-classic.name: Vinyl Classic
01-vinyl-classic.description: Classic vinyl drum sound with warm, nostalgic character

02-vinyl-dusty.name: Vinyl Dusty
02-vinyl-dusty.description: Aged vinyl drums with dust and crackle for authentic vintage feel
02-vinyl-dusty.style: Boom Bap, Old School Hip-Hop, Jazz

03-vinyl-lofi.name: Vinyl Lo-Fi
03-vinyl-lofi.description: Lo-fi vinyl drums with reduced fidelity and analog warmth

04-vinyl-crispy.name: Vinyl Crispy
04-vinyl-crispy.description: Crisp vinyl drums with enhanced high-frequency content

05-vinyl-warm.name: Vinyl Warm
05-vinyl-warm.description: Warm, saturated vinyl drums with tube-like compression

kurzweil.name: Kurzweil Drums
kurzweil.description: Professional drum samples from Kurzweil synthesizers and sound modules

01-kurzweil-classic.name: Kurzweil Classic
01-kurzweil-classic.description: Classic Kurzweil drum sounds with signature digital character

02-kurzweil-modern.name: Kurzweil Modern
02-kurzweil-modern.description: Modern Kurzweil drums with enhanced processing and dynamics

03-kurzweil-vintage.name: Kurzweil Vintage
03-kurzweil-vintage.description: Vintage-style Kurzweil drums with retro character

04-kurzweil-electronic.name: Kurzweil Electronic
04-kurzweil-electronic.description: Pure electronic drums from Kurzweil sound engines

05-kurzweil-experimental.name: Kurzweil Experimental
05-kurzweil-experimental.description: Experimental and unique Kurzweil drum textures

06-kurzweil-ambient.name: Kurzweil Ambient
06-kurzweil-ambient.description: Atmospheric Kurzweil drums for ambient productions

07-kurzweil-percussive.name: Kurzweil Percussive
07-kurzweil-percussive.description: Percussive-focused Kurzweil drums with extended range

08-kurzweil-dynamic.name: Kurzweil Dynamic
08-kurzweil-dynamic.description: Dynamic Kurzweil drums with expressive velocity response
